properties.areaDesc: Dunkirk to Buffalo NY; Ripley to Dunkirk NY
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 5 at 2:42PM EST until January 7 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds to 30 knots and waves 8 to 11 feet
expected.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Erie from Ripley to
Buffalo.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Winds and/or waves will cause hazardous conditions
that could capsize or damage small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY
